definition[0]: related to a whole nation as opposed to any of its parts
example[0]: Religion matters very much at a national level.
example[1]: Between 1929 and 1933 Americaâ€™s national income fell by more than half.
example[2]: There are strong indications that the prime minister will call national elections in May.
definition[1]: relating to one particular nation as opposed to other nations
example[3]: We refuse to sign any treaty that is against our national interests.
definition[2]: owned or controlled by the central government of a country
example[4]: the National Institute for Space Research
definition[3]: someone who is a citizen of a particular country but is living in another country
example[6]: Foreign nationals were advised to leave the country.
example[7]: Turkish nationals who are living in the UK
